import React from 'react' const Nitem =(props)=> { let { title, description, imageUrl, newsUrl, author, date, source } = props; return (
{source}
{title}..

{description}..

By {!author ? "Unknown" : author} on {new Date(date).toGMTString()}

Read More..
) } export default Nitem
